enWisdom: The remembrance [of Allah] is a light and guidance
Remembrance of Allah brings comfort [and delight]
Remembrance of Allah is the polishing of visions and illumination of the inner selves
Remembrance [of Allah] is the guidance of the intellects and the enlightenment of the souls

Wisdom: الذِّكْرُ يُونِسُ اللُّبَّ وَيُنِيرُ الْقَلْبَ وَيَسْتَنْزِلُ الرَّحْمَةَ
enWisdom: Remembering [Allah] comforts the soul, illuminates the heart and brings down the mercy [of Allah]

Wisdom: الذِّكْرُ نُورُ الْعَقْلِ [الْعُقُولِ‏] وَحَيَاةُ النُّفُوسِ وَجَلَاءُ الصُّدُورِ
enWisdom: Remembering [Allah] is the light of intellect, the life of the souls and the polishing of the hearts

Wisdom: أَفْضَلُ الذِّكْرِ الْقُرْآنُ بِهِ تُشْرَحُ الصُّدُورُ وَتَسْتَنِيرُ السَّرَائِرُ
enWisdom: The best reminder is the Qur’an, through it the breasts are expanded and the souls are illuminated

Wisdom: إِنَّ اللَّهَ سُبْحَانَهُ جَعَلَ الذِّكْرَ جَلَاءَ الْقُلُوبِ تُبْصِرُ بِهِ بَعْدَ الْعَشْوَةِ وَتَسْمَعُ بِهِ بَعْدَ الْوَقْرَةِ وَتَنْقَادُ بِهِ بَعْدَ الْمُعَانَدَةِ
enWisdom: Verily Allah, the Glorified, has made [His] remembrance a polishing for the hearts, to see with after blindness and listen with after deafness and to become submissive with it after obduracy
The fruit of remembrance [of Allah] is illumination of the hearts
Remembrance of Allah is the light of faith

Wisdom: ذِكْرُ اللَّهِ جَلَاءُ الصُّدُورِ وَطُمَأْنِينَةُ الْقُلُوبِ
enWisdom: Remembrance of Allah is the polishing of the breasts and the tranquillity of the hearts

Wisdom: ذِكْرُ اللَّهِ يُنِيرُ الْبَصَائِرَ وَيُونِسُ الضَّمَائِرَ
enWisdom: Remembrance of Allah illuminates the visions and comforts the consciences

Wisdom: ذِكْرُ اللَّهِ تُسْتَنْجَحُ بِهِ الْأُمُورُ وَتَسْتَنِيرُ بِهِ السَّرَائِرُ
enWisdom: The remembrance of Allah is what makes matters successful and inner selves illuminated

Wisdom: عَلَيْكَ بِذِكْرِ اللَّهِ فَإِنَّهُ نُورُ الْقَلْبِ
enWisdom: You must espouse the remembrance of Allah for it is surely the light of the heart
In the remembrance of Allah there is life for the hearts
One who remembers Allah is gains insight

Wisdom: مَنْ ذَكَرَ اللَّهَ سُبْحَانَهُ أَحْيَا اللَّهُ قَلْبَهُ وَنَوَّرَ عَقْلَهُ وَلُبَّهُ
enWisdom: Whoever remembers Allah, the Glorified, Allah enlivens his heart and illuminates his intellect and his mind
There is no guidance like remembrance [and glorification of Allah]
